summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 BMW X5. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBERS: 16V071000 (AIR BAGS) AND 16V364000 (AIR BAGS). THE PARTS TO DO THE REPAIR WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT DID NOT NOTIFY A DEALER. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED IN OCTOBER OF 2016. THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE GOING TO BE SHIPPED IN JANUARY OF 2017 AND THAT A DEALER WOULD CALL THE CONTACT. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE FRONT PASSENGER SIDE AIR BAG INDICATOR MALFUNCTIONED AND ILLUMINATED. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
